data.text: @Brenda26024081 @CTVNews Have you noticed that literally every medicine has tons of potential adverse effects. Question, have YOU read the report? Do you have any clue how to interpret the information?
@CTVNews I think it is, but at least protect those continuing to wear masks from public harassment and ridicule.

@daledrew87 @CTVNews From a Newfie to a Newfie, follow the science lol, biggest joke ever, now go read the Phizer report just released, and see if you can comprehend the science behind the COVID money making scam.
Get-er done, by.

@CTVNews Stop the fear propoganda...

You have no credibility!

@slangtro @WesEggink @Felineprof @CTVNews If she thought it was necessary yes, just like when we were on vacation and my daughter missed one of her shots they give at school, our next appointment the doctor brought it up. Move on

@madkingkade @WesEggink @Felineprof @CTVNews I didn't ask my doctor, but she didn't seek me out to discuss it, so I can assume she's against me getting vaccinated... is one heck of a spin.  But allllright I guess.
@CTVNews Ontario is the last place in the world to drop mask mandates. Long overdue
@CTVNews It's now a choice. Wear it if you want.
@CTVNews Some do, some don't. Who's right?

@CTVNews Completing self-assessment MUST rely on precise, up-to-date and continual data available for all. To not have this information is an abdication of the responsibility of our medical professionals. NO PLACE FOR POLITICS! https://t.co/DKOtWlGuR8
